short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for LexiSnap to enhance vocabulary learning.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LexiSnap is a Google Chrome extension designed to enhance vocabulary learning seamlessly. It allows users to effortlessly select and save new vocabulary words from any webpage they are reading. With just a click, the selected words, along with their context, are added to the user's personal vocabulary list in their LexiSnap account. The extension integrates smoothly with the LexiSnap mobile app, enabling users to review, manage, and enrich their vocabulary on the go. This powerful tool supports a more efficient and integrated learning experience for language enthusiasts.
